item.title: High Performance TiDB Lesson 05：DDL 性能优化
item.description: 人人都知道贵人重要，但是不是你想贵人指点，然后在那个时间那个地点那个贵人就出现了， 而且贵人一般都很忙，凭什么他就高看你一眼，哭着喊着贴上来指

item.title: High Performance TiDB Lesson 04：Execution 性能优化
item.description: 预习 w issue 17824 思路 What is the meaning of Warning in mysql about#17824 ,and I can not find the coding by debug in Execution 可以看一下 https://github.com/pingcap/tidb/blob/b99376b521e6faaa1a3ec17ca99505caedca751a/expression/builtin_cast.go#L215 expression/builtin_cast.go:215 type castAsDecimalFunctionClass struct { https://github.com/pingcap/tidb/blob/9c2d7c2663dbdc0dab739d3c5e4e3b87bf90328e/expression/builtin_cast.go#L1204 expression/builtin_cast.go:1204 type builtinCastStringAsDecimalSig struct { 实现 TestInsertOnDuplicateKey 塔山 别人例子 我看懂了吗？ https://pingcap.com/blog-cn/reconstruct-built-in-function/
